You get toxic because you cannot control yourself - nobody else forced you to press enter and type the things you typed. Until you learn to take responsibility for your own actions, you will likely find yourself continuing to get punished.

OP, I agree you have every right to be annoyed and agree that every player has at some point or another gotten annoyed enough to say something that someone would call "toxic". That's the problem with the witch hunt RIOT games is practicing by banning and taking accounts from people as a solution.

I am completely unpolitically asking why people forgot the saying 'It's better that 10 guilty men go free than one innocent man be wrongly convicted'. Do you even have an idea what other people were saying to this guy before he made these replies? I have seen soooo many games where the chat got disgusting but just didn't report it. Have you guys not? Because we must be playing two different games of League in that case....

No amount of irritation could excuse the OP's chat. Excessive vulgarity, hate speech, excessive insults, there's really no reason that their chat should be given a pass.

And, I find it funny you bring up a saying like that. Does this mean you find the OP innocent? For all his vitriolic and completely unnecessary hate? What place does that all have in a videogame?
